snippet: The Red Bulls clinched a Major League Soccer playoff berth after Tim Cahill’s header in the final seconds of stoppage time lifted them to a 2-2 draw with the New England Revolution.
abstract: New York Red Bulls clinch Major League Soccer playoff berth with 2-2 draw with New England Revolution; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls clinched a Major League Soccer playoff berth after Tim Cahill’s header in the final seconds of stoppage time lifted them to a 2-2 draw with the New England Revolution.
